properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 9:39PM CST until January 13 at 11:36AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a New Flood Warning for the
Tombigbee River at Amory for higher flooding.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tombigbee River near Amory
* until Monday January 13.
* At 9 PM Saturday the stage was...24.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 25.6 feet on Sunday January 12.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Saturday January 11 and will
continue rising to near 25.6 feet by Sunday January 12. The river
will fall below flood stage Monday January 13.
At 25.0 feet, Widespread lowland and farm land flooding is
occurring..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
